mapper.insert: insert into ALBUMLIST ( ALBUM_NUM, ALBUM_WRITER, ALBUM_NAME, ALBUM_PARTY, ALBUM_DELETE, ALBUM_CONTENTS, ALBUM_VERSION, ALBUM_CATEGORY, ALBUM_IDENTIFIER ) values ( ALBUMLIST_SEQ.nextval, #{album_writer}, #{album_name}, #{album_party}, #{album_delete}, #{album_contents}, #{album_version}, #{album_category}, #{album_identifier} )
insert into Page ( PAGE_ID, PAGE_ALBUMNUM, PAGE_NUM, PAGE_HTML ) values ( PAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{page_albumnum}, #{page_num}, #{page_html} )
mapper.select: select album_num from albumlist where ALBUM_IDENTIFIER = #{album_identifier}
